title: Can't Login to my league of legends account
body: When I try to login, my client says Authenticating, then says "An unexpected error occured".

replies.body: I'm seeing a lot of these login issues coming from EUW and I'm wondering if there's any possibility of this being caused by some kind of ISP routing issue. If you don't mind, run a quick traceroute to the EUW servers at 185.40.65.1 using a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Post the results here so I can take a look!

Sry i couldn't find attachments

Yea that trace looks like it's having a bit of trouble making it's way to our servers. I'm not 100% sure what the main problem is, but that worst column shows a good deal of packet loss it looks like. I'd shoot this over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have them dig a little deeper.
